backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor that manages chat sessions, user profiles, and messages using mixins for blob storage and authorization. Exposes CRUD operations for sessions, messages, and files with access-control checks on every endpoint.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming removal of the 'Made by you'/'Made with AI' watermark branding from HomePage.tsx and llmService.ts with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files, describing each file's purpose, theme, and key changes (e.g., red-orange brand palette, watermark removal, component updates).
frontend/index.css: Global CSS for the Noventra.Ai dark theme using OKLCH color tokens (indigo/cyan palette), Space Grotesk/Inter/JetBrains Mono fonts, glassmorphism utilities, glow effects, and animation keyframes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'Noventra.Ai' and mounting the React root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that sets up TanStack Router with Home, Sessions, NewSession, and Chat routes, wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and ThemeProvider, and conditionally renders the ProfileSetup modal.
frontend/src/components/CodeBlock.tsx: Reusable code display component with macOS-style terminal chrome (traffic-light dots), a filename/language label, syntax-highlighted monospace content, and a clipboard copy button.
frontend/src/components/LivePreview.tsx: Iframe-based live HTML preview component with desktop/tablet/mobile viewport switching, a refresh button, and an open-in-new-tab action using a Blob URL.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button that handles authentication state, shows a spinner during login, and clears the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/Logo.tsx: Renders the Noventra.ai logo with an animated SVG flame icon and a styled wordmark, supporting 'small' and 'large' size variants.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays a chat message bubble for user or AI messages, parsing content into text and code block segments, with an optional live HTML preview button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal form component that prompts new users to enter their name and saves it via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation to complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Button that copies the current page URL to the clipboard and shows a toast notification, toggling to a 'Copied!' state briefly after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and persisted identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, session management, message addition, and file updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, defines CSS custom properties for the dark theme design system, and declares reusable Tailwind component classes for glass effects, gradients, glows, and buttons.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat interface page that loads a session, displays messages, sends user input to an AI service, extracts generated HTML, and persists messages and files to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing landing page showcasing Noventra.ai features, stats, and CTA buttons with login/navigation support.
frontend/src/pages/NewSessionPage.tsx: Form page for creating a new project session by entering a name and selecting a project type, then navigating to the chat page.
frontend/src/pages/SessionsPage.tsx: Displays a list of the user's sessions as cards with project type, timestamps, and message counts, supporting navigation and deletion.
frontend/src/services/llmService.ts: LLM service that generates AI responses and scaffolds HTML templates for different project types (landing, fullstack, mobile, API) based on user input and session context.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark-themed design system with custom OKLCH colors, fonts, border radii, shadows, and keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking an existing feature and a pending request, both related to removing 'Made with AI' branding from the app.
